solution_line_template: Each pizza is {slices_per_pizza} slices. Bob at {slices_per_pizza} slices / {bob_denominator} = <<{slices_per_pizza}/{bob_denominator}={bob_slices}>>{bob_slices} slices.
Tom ate one third, or {slices_per_pizza} slices / {tom_denominator} = <<{slices_per_pizza}/{tom_denominator}={tom_slices}>>{tom_slices} slices.
Sally ate one sixth, or {slices_per_pizza} slices / {sally_denominator} = <<{slices_per_pizza}/{sally_denominator}={sally_slices}>>{sally_slices} slices.
Jerry ate one quarter, or {slices_per_pizza} slices / {jerry_denominator} = <<{slices_per_pizza}/{jerry_denominator}={jerry_slices}>>{jerry_slices} slices.

In total, they ate {bob_slices} slices + {tom_slices} slices + {sally_slices} slices + {jerry_slices} slices = <<{bob_slices}+{tom_slices}+{sally_slices}+{jerry_slices}={total_eaten_slices}>>{total_eaten_slices} slices.

So they were left with {slices_per_pizza} slices per pizza * {num_pizzas} pizzas - {total_eaten_slices} slices = {slices_per_pizza}*{num_pizzas} slices - {total_eaten_slices} slices = <<{slices_per_pizza}*{num_pizzas}-{total_eaten_slices}={left_over_slices}>>{left_over_slices} slices.
